title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1457/97 of 25 July 1997 amending Annexes III (B), IV and VI to Council Regulation (EC) No 517/94 on common rules for imports of textile products from certain third countries not covered by bilateral agreements, protocols or other arrangements, or by other specific Community import rules
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1457/97 of 25 July 1997 amending Annexes III (B), IV and VI to Council Regulation (EC) No 517/94 on common rules for imports of textile products from certain third countries not covered by bilateral agreements, protocols or other arrangements, or by other specific Community import rules
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes III (B), IV and VI to Regulation (EC) No 517/94 are hereby replaced by the text in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1997.
For the Commission
Leon BRITTAN
Vice-President
